remarks: The ` X ` -th index projection acts as the identity on elements of the ` X ` -th factor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjfval.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjlid.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
dpjlid.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( S ` X ) ) $.
dpjlid $p |- ( ph -> ( ( P ` X ) ` A ) = A ) $.
